data.content:
Look at the picture and read the questions.
Choose any one question to answer.

படத்தைப் பார்த்து கேள்விகளைப் படியுங்கள்.
பதிலளிக்க ஏதேனும் ஒரு கேள்வியைத் தேர்ந்தெடுங்கள்.

content.name: Where are the fruits?
content.modelAnsTranscript: Student A: Can you see the fruits? </br> Student B: Yes I can. </br> Student A: Where are they? </br> Student B: They are in front of the girl.
content.answerText:
• Look at the photograph and listen to an example.
  • Discuss with your partner. Practice your answer.
  • When you are ready, record it by clicking 'Record'.
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the ► button.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'. ​

content.name: Where is the girl sitting?
content.modelAnsTranscript:
A: Can you see the girl?
B: Yes, I can.
A: Where is she sitting?
B: She is sitting on a chair.

content.name: Where is the chair?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: Can you see the chair? </br> B: Yes, I can see it. </br> A: Where is it? </br> B: It is next to the girl.
